entry.title: Roasted Relish Second Flush Darjeeling Black Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Black Tea
Price: 3.55 - 8.64 (2 variants)

At a distance of about 32 km from Darjeeling, Tinchuley is an offbeat hamlet situated close to the West Bengal-Sikkim border. With an altitude of 5550 ft, the name of the place derives from the words 'tin' and 'chula', which translates as 'three ovens' because the trio of hills constituting the hill station resembles mud ovens.

entry.title: Tippy Clonal Gold Organic Darjeeling Black Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 4.13 - 159.99 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Twirly/wiry black leaves with few brown open leaves with golden tips in abundance.
Tea Color:
Light amber
Tea Infusion:
Bright coppery leaves & buds with a highly fragrant nose.
Prime season Organic Second Flush tea from the well-known & picturesque, Phuguri Estate in Darjeeling. A fine plucking from young bushes, this well known & reputed varietal comes with an elegant, sweetish, fruity flavor that has hints of ripe cherries and is extremely charming to the palate. The prominent clonal notes contribute in making this a most memorable cuppa this season.

entry.title: Golden Glaze Assam Black Tea Late Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 5.28 - 204.29 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Golden Tips with few shades of dark grey.
Tea Colour:
Bright Amber
Tea Infusion:
Bright coppery.
Late Summer tea from the well-managed Dhelakhat estate in upper Assam. Hand-sorted and patiently rolled, this specially-made miniature lot consists of pure golden tips. The liquor is consistent & bright and has a very smooth, flavoury and mildly malty taste that is reminiscent of roasted almonds. The cuppa is one that makes Assam proud.

entry.title: Summer Moonlight Halo Darjeeling Black Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 6.13 - 237.11 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Dark, quite bold leaves with few brown open leaves and abundantly silver tipped.
Tea Colour:
Bright golden
Tea Infusion:
Coppery leaves & buds with subtle & fragrant nose.
A specially-plucking Tea passionately made from selective tea & bud sets at the highly renowned Margaret's Hope estate situated in the hilly shadows of the Himalayas in Darjeeling. Very subtle, smooth, mildly flavoury with pleasant fruity notes, this is an extremely likeable & classic tea for which Margaret's Hope Moonlights are well known and loved.

entry.title: Muscatel Wave Darjeeling Black Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 1.89 - 73.02 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Rolled blackish / brownish leaves with few golden / silver tips.
Tea Colour:
Bright amber
Tea Infusion:
Mostly coppery leaves with a prominent nose.
A fine prime Summer Flush varietal from the famed & panoramic Jungpana estate in Darjeeling. The striking flavour loaded with fruitiness comes out well in the palette and the striking notes of rare muscatel make for an enduring finish and aftertaste.

entry.title: Moondrop Gold Darjeeling Black Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 5.03 - 194.69 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Mostly silvery/golden tips with a token presence of black/brown open leaves.
Tea Colour:
Bright golden
Tea Infusion:
Mostly coppery leaves with a striking & flavoury nose.
Prime Second Flush tea from the picturesque and Darjeeling's oldest tea estate - Puttabong. An extremely speciality tea, carefully harvested on sunny days - amidst the seasonal rains - this tea is indeed a visual delight. The unmissable and pleasant aroma, followed by the sharp & rare fruitiness, completely overwhelms the palate and leaves behind a memorable aftertaste. Perhaps, the most unique offering this season.

entry.title: 24 Carat Golden Tips Exotic Assam Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 48.09 - 90.82 (2 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Well-rolled pure golden leaves.
Tea Color:
Bright amber
Tea Infusion:
Bright coppery buds & leaves with a very pleasant fragrant nose.
An exceptional & rare Tea passionately made from selective leaves plucked at the Mokalbari estate, on the banks of the Brahmaputra river upper Assam. This tea made from a special tea clone consisting of pure & tender golden tips, is not just outstanding in the cup but also a visual delight. The smooth & pronounced flavor that enchants with its clonal elements, the unmissable mild sweetness, the refined subtlety of this very special offering and the mouthful and rounded flavor, all combine to make the olfactory senses dazzle. Addition of a dash of milk can give a new twist to the taste of this most exotic tea.

entry.title: Pride of Sikkim Rare Organic Temi Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Black Tea
Price: 26.10

An outstanding & rare Second Flush Sikkim Tea meant for connoisseurs of Golden Tips Teas across the globe. Originating from the Temi TeaÂ  Estate which produces one of the finest teas in the world, this selection with a unique and typical flavor, is packed in an elegant velvet bag adorned by the knot to Eternity, articulately hand-embroidered in the golden thread (zari) in the zarodi form of craftsmanship and placed into a window-lid pinewood box.

entry.title: Silver Needle Organic Darjeeling White Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: White Tea
Price: 4.22 - 163.27 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Sharp & long silver needles having light greenish tinge with a few darkish leaves
Tea Colour:
Light yellow
Tea Infusion:
Mostly light green and brown leaf & bud sets with mild vegetal nose
New season 2024 summer flush White Tea tea from the Okayti estate in Darjeeling in the foothills of the Himalayas. The special designer tea has a very mellowed & mildly flavory taste with a soft fruitiness with a pleasant vegetal aroma and ends with a sweet-sour finish. This multiple health-beneficial tea is also a pleasure to brew and drink

entry.title: Clonal Dream Darjeeling Black Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 12.51 - 484.07 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Longish twirly blackish/grey rolled leaves with abundant silvery/golden tips.
Tea Colour:
Golden yellow
Tea Infusion:
Mostly coppery leaves & buds with a deep clonal nose.
New 2024 Summer Tea from the picturesque Glenburn Estate in Darjeeling. This is an excellent offering that offers a mouthful of clonal flavour and aroma that is lasting and most fulfilling. The fruitiness adds to the drinking pleasure which is overwhelming and makes this one of the best teas this season to relish.

entry.title: White Horizon Darjeeling White Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: White Tea
Price: 7.53 - 291.26 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Mostly needle-like silver tips with a few dark grey leaves
Tea Colour:
Very pale yellow
Tea Infusion:
Mostly green leaves & buds with some darkish tinge and a soft nose.
New Season 2024 Exotic early summer-harvest White Tea From The renowned Jungpana estate In Darjeeling. This selectively plucked, hand-rolled & naturally dried offering consists of a very small quantity. The flavour profile is extremely mellowed with a soft yet distinct fruity flavour, not found in most white teas. The subtle aroma wafts from the cup to this a rarity amongst the finest teas.The multiple health benefits add to the tea's magnificence.

New season 2024 Summer Darjeeling tea from the Organic Arya estate in Darjeeling. This is a prime second flush tea that has the popular fruitiness with mild muscatel notes, reminiscent of seasonal grapes.

Dark grey/black leaves with several silvery/golden tips.
Tea Colour:
Amber

Prime Second Flush tea from the scenic Puttabong estate in Darjeeling. The very special Moondrop plucking is a highly solicited and awaited variant. Tea Colour:
Light amber
Tea Infusion:
Most bright copper, with just a few greenish leaves and a clonal fragrant nose.
Early and uniquely processed new 2024 Second Flush tea from the picturesque Puttabong estate in northern Darjeeling. This special early summer offering has most profound clonal notes with the rare muscatel rolling on the palate. The defined smoothness and pleasant flavour with a very smooth finish, makes this a very desirable pick this season.

entry.title: Emerald Organic Darjeeling Green Tea Second Flush 2024

Light yellow

A very fine new season organic Green Tea from the highly renowned Arya estate in Darjeeling. Extremely mellowed, soft and subtle with a very pleasant vegetal and floral aroma, this is a one-of-its-kind tea that is not only very health-beneficial but also offers a unique drinking pleasure. Amongst the very finest of green teas.

entry.title: Pride Of Darjeling Rare Second Flush Tea in Pinewood Box with Zardosi Work on Velvet Pouch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Teas India
Type: Black Tea
Price: 33.55 - 49.00 (2 variants)

A unique Darjeeling tea with a pronounced rare muscatel flavor. High grown amidst the misty mountains and sheltered by the snow-capped Himalayas. This tea is one of the best offerings from the world's most famous tea-growing region, aptly named 'Pride of Darjeeling'.
